name: The Axe of Kolt
overview: The Axe of Kolt is a fantasy themed text adventure for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum. it was developed by Larry Horsfield and released by FSF Adventures in 1990. Game description: The peaceful kingdom of Hecate has been invaded by the Xixon, an evil race of lizard men who have reappeared after all were thought to have been vanquished by the hero, Kolt, over 200 years before. Kolt used an axe, forged from elf metal by a sorcerer, but the axe was buried with Kolt when he died, and the location of his tomb has been forgotten by most folk. Can you, Alaric Blackmoon, once a roving mercenary and swordsman, now just a penniless wanderer, find the lost "Axe of Kolt" and return it to its rightful owner, the young king Kelson of Hecate??
